ygData.subject: Re: Hot key banks (800x600)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah what he was saying is that he (and I, too) play in 800x600 - I *LOVE* that immersive feeling on a 20 screen ;)  When playing in 800x600 Fullscreen
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:07 PM 9/2/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Douglas Bierbower" <dbierbow@...>
>
>I play in 640x480 and I can open bags in my hot key banks...do it all the
>time to access my other instruments.
>

Yeah what he was saying is that he (and I, too) play in 800x600 - I *LOVE*
that immersive feeling on a 20" screen ;) When playing in 800x600
Fullscreen mode, you lose the little popup windows like containers and
quantity slider bars. Real pain sometimes. Ah well, sacrifices we make to
have the best looking game available.

*grins*

Talies
